Hello! Hello, %1$s! Recent Notifications Menu Profile About Tatum Games FAQ
Tatum Games is a Google-backed startup on a mission to innovate the mobile gaming industry while creating pathways for underrepresented communities in tech. Learn more at https://www.tatumgames.com Our Mission We create opportunities for underrepresented communities in tech and gaming by providing free computers, training, and mentorship to build the next generation of game developers. Our Impact With only 2% of game developers being Black and 3% Latinx, we\'re working to change the future by empowering diverse voices to create, lead, and innovate in gaming. What is Tatum Tech? Tatum Tech is our bi-annual community event that bridges the digital divide in South LA. We give away 100+ computers and offer hands-on tech workshops led by professionals from top game studios. Learn more at https://tatumgames.com Powered by MIKROS Our flagship product, MIKROS, helps game developers acquire users, grow revenue, and gain insights through advanced analytics powered by AI and patented technology. Explore at https://wwww.developer.tatumgames.com Join the MIKROS Mafia Connect with game developers, influencers, and industry insiders. Get support, exclusive perks, and early access to opportunities. Join us on Discord: https://discord.com/invite/6FzqSUDRXQ
General Questions What is Tatum Tech? Tatum Tech is a series of free events that introduce underrepresented communities to careers in tech and game development. We host hands-on workshops, coding challenges, and networking with industry professionals. Who can attend Tatum Tech events? Anyone can attend! We especially welcome participants from underrepresented communities, including women, people of color, and individuals from low-income backgrounds. How do I register for events? You can register through this app by visiting the Upcoming Events section. Just tap "Register" on any available event. Registration is completely free.
